name: Pilani Experts Technology Labs Private Limited
description: Provider of a platform connecting individuals in need of professional advice. The company offers a cohesive platform to discover and schedule calls with experts to get advice across domains where users can choose with whom they would like to connect, book a time slot and receive consultation on the phone enabling users to make informed decisions taken with inputs from professional experts.
one_liner: Provider of a platform connecting individuals in need of professional advice. The company offers a cohesive platform to discover and schedule calls with experts to get advice across domains where users can choose with whom they would like to connect, book a time slot and receive consultation on the phone enabling users to make informed decisions taken with inputs from professional experts.
